[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” full_height=”yes” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” enable_overlay=”enable_overlay_value” overlay_color=”#b281e2″ el_id=”home” el_class=”dark_bg bubbles home-top-sec” css=”.vc_custom_1649955435395{background-image: url(https://www.realinteract.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/katherine-contactNursePage-1.jpg?id=8422) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class=”video-txt-style” css=”.vc_custom_1621788333056{margin-top: 50px !important;}”]

WELCOME TO
Real Interact

[/vc_column_text]

Healthcare

With more than ten years of experience in the call center industry, we have formulated a package of marketing and service scenarios for customers in various industries.
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” full_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1649949315129{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”dark_bg txt-hover-effect” el_id=”How It Works?”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1620463630096{padding: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” el_class=”howItWork-row2-right hiw-home-sec”][vc_column_inner el_class=”video-block” width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”video-block-txt” width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1556128312430{padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.77) !important;*background-color: rgb(255,255,255) !important;}”][vc_column_text css_animation=”none”]

Healthcare Call Center Services

 

Is your customer service costing you heavy time and money? If your in-house team is getting stucked between call center services and patient care. Get Services from a healthcare call center so that you can pay attention on your patients and give them a better experience and better value. For This, you need a good inbound and outbound medical call center assistance to take care of insurance verification, physician referrals, medical answering services, hospice answering, etc.

Real Interact has been a leading healthcare call center services provider for more than a decade. If you have been thinking about the best medical or healthcare call center for your hospital, clinic or other healthcare facility, we are here to help you.

Medical Contact Center

 

Real Interact’s healthcare call center will become a part of your team, managing your data, patients, and vendors as well as providing better patient engagement. Real Interact’s best healthcare call center agents provide you specialized medical administrative support. Work with us so you can focus on your medical products and/or services while we take care of all support services.

SECURITY PROTOCOLS

 

All the information is handled strictly via customers’ HIPAA compliant scheduling software (EMR/EHR). For this purpose, BPO gets it’s IP address whitelisted so that the software could only be accessed from one location.
BPO does not allow it’s agents to do any kind of browsing during the work.
All computers are equipped with latest anti-virus software.
BPO agents work under the supervision of floor managers.
BPO monitors the calls via a QA team.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” full_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1620462014862{background-image: url(https://www.realinteract.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/home-2.jpeg?id=6742) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”dark_bg txt-hover-effect”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1620463630096{padding: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” el_class=”howItWork-row2-right hiw-home-sec”][vc_column_inner el_class=”video-block” width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”video-block-txt” width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1556128312430{padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.77) !important;*background-color: rgb(255,255,255) !important;}”][vc_column_text css_animation=”none”]

How To Get Started

 

At Real Interact, we make our experience in the implementation and management of all computer applications of the company available to clients, Check out how to get started:

    1. Sign up
    2. Our operations / onboarding manager contact to gather requirement for start up
    3. Assign / train resources based on requirements gathered
    4. On boarding team will kick starts the project
    5. After a week, Schedule meeting with client for any feedback and inquiries
    6. QA Operations Teams Monitor the progress from the day one for continuous coaching and QA

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Learn More” style=”custom” custom_background=”#d8d8d8″ custom_text=”#ffffff” shape=”square” size=”lg” align=”left” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.realinteract.com%2Fhow-it-works%2F|title:HOW%20IT%20WORKS||” css=”.vc_custom_1614500605036{margin-top: 40px !important;}” el_class=”hit-btn”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” full_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css_animation=”none” css=”.vc_custom_1620461998422{background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_class=”light_bg” el_id=”features”][vc_column]

Why Hire Us

[vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Less Management Efforts

No Overhead Costs To Manage Resources

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

No Facility Cost

No Utility,Insurance & Rent to Pay

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Reduces Employee Costs

No Hiring & Retention Issues

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

No Overheads

Reduces Cost Of Support Department

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_btn title=”VIEW MORE” style=”custom” custom_background=”#0a0a0a” custom_text=”#ffffff” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.realinteract.com%2Fpricing%2F|title:Pricing||” el_class=”ri-btn”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” full_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” el_id=”Call Center Pricing” el_class=”light_bg” css=”.vc_custom_1620462908755{background-color: #ffffff !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner]

Call Center Pricing

Our Pricing Plans are Cost-Effective

$15.99 / Hour / Agent
  • Daily/Weekly/Monthly Reports
  • 24/7 Call Center Support
  • Training
  • QA Department
  • Managing Resources
  • Client Communication
  • Fully Equipped Call Center Environment
View More
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” full_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1614776876493{background-image: url(https://www.realinteract.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/home-4-1.jpg?id=6848) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”dark_bg” el_id=”testimoniials”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

WHAT THEY SAY

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

Real Interact has made a real positive influence in my office. We have extreme call demands and they were able to relieve a lot of the receptionist duties that were very challenging to fulfill. I am very happy with the service and plan to continue long term.

South Florida Dermatology

RealInteract helped us greatly increase our call center performance with very professional and proactive staff. Real Interact is very accommodating and always willing to meet and surpass our expectations. We recommend them for any of your business needs. ".

Union County Healthcare

I came across Real-Interact and reached out in regards to a telemarketer for my small business to do my cold calling. Real-Interact was extremely receptive and let me explain everything in my own words as to what my goal was. Everyone on the team I interacted with was extremely professional, straight forward, prompt and well informed. Within a short period of time the team had my campaign up and rolling with the telemarketer doing an incredible job following my script. I would recommend any business in need of telemarketing services reach out to Real-Interact.

Hammond Health Services

They are professional on the phone, and we are getting good results.

Family Health Clinic

Realinteract has been tremendous for our growth--going from one Urgent Care to three. They are able to handle high call volumes with professionalism. I trust them and would highly recommend them for your business.

Premier Healthcare express urgent care
